overview:
Vice President, BroadCloud

Ken Rokoff boasts an extensive background in sales and business development in the telecommunications and Internet industries. In his current role, Ken focuses on generating, analyzing, and developing new business opportunities for BroadSoft, with particular emphasis on leveraging the company’s relationships with strategic and international partners.

While serving as Vice President of Strategic Initiatives at iBasis Speech Solutions, Ken devised and implemented a successful business plan to increase the company’s focus on the emerging speech recognition and voice portal market. Ken has also held senior management roles at V-ONE Corporation, and Sprint International where he was responsible for international network sales in Europe, Africa, and the Middle East.
